name: Mobi Lab
tagline: Designing and developing mobile, AR experiences
description:
Mobi Lab is a mobile design and development agency based in Estonia and UK with a clear mission - to create the best mobile and augmented reality applications.
Mobi Lab combines business, design, and engineering expertise to deliver a digital experience that is delightful to use, and increases our customers’ return on the investment.
Digital product design
Product strategy
Discovery workshops
User research
UX/UI design
Identity & branding
Software engineering
iOS development
Android development
React Native development
AR/VR on Unity
Quality Assurance
Product Management:
Product KPIs
Business model workshops
Product planning
Product building
CTO-as-a-service
Here you can take a look at some examples of Mobi Lab's design processes: https://lab.mobi/our-work
